DOC.brief_title: Rapid HIV Testing Counseling Drug Abuse Treatment
DOC.detailed_description: This randomize controlled clinical trial individual receive drug abuse treatment recruit participate multi-center HIV test counsel study . The purpose study assess relative effectiveness three HIV test strategy increase receipt HIV test result : ( 1 ) on-site HIV rapid test brief , participant-tailored prevention counseling , ( 2 ) on-site HIV rapid test information , ( 3 ) referral off-site HIV testing . The study also assess effectiveness three test strategy reduce HIV sexual risk behavior . Injection drug risk behavior secondary outcome . Participants complete baseline assessment report demographic , HIV test history sexual drug-using risk behavior , randomize one three group . At one month post-randomization , participant complete follow-up assessment determine whether receive HIV test result . At six month post-randomization , participant complete follow-up assessment ass change HIV sexual risk behavior .
